pizzerias.name: Pizzeria Ai Marmi
pizzerias.description: Known as 'L'Obitorio' (The Morgue) by locals due to its marble tables, this classic Roman pizzeria serves thin, crispy pizzas including a special Hawaiian version for international visitors.

pizzerias.name: Emma Pizzeria
pizzerias.address: Via del Monte della Farina, 28, 00186 Roma RM
pizzerias.specialty: Ananas e Prosciutto (pineapple, cooked ham, fior di latte)
pizzerias.description: Upscale pizzeria using organic flours and premium ingredients. They offer a Hawaiian-style pizza that pairs perfectly with their extensive wine list.

pizzerias.name: Seu Pizza Illuminati
pizzerias.specialty: Tropicana Remix (pineapple, rum-infused ham, smoked provola)
pizzerias.description: Award-winning innovative pizzeria known for experimental combinations. Their Hawaiian-inspired pizza features rum-infused ham and caramelized pineapple.

pizzerias.name: Pizzarium Bonci
pizzerias.specialty: Pizza al Taglio Hawaii (pineapple, prosciutto cotto, mozzarella)
pizzerias.description: Gabriele Bonci's famous pizza-by-the-slice shop offers creative toppings and experimental combinations, including a seasonal Hawaiian-style option.

pizzerias.name: La Pratolina
pizzerias.specialty: Pinsa Esotica (pineapple, cooked ham, mozzarella on oval pinsa base)
pizzerias.description: Specializing in pinsa romana, the oval-shaped ancestor of pizza, La Pratolina offers a lighter, more digestible base that pairs wonderfully with their pineapple topping.

pizzerias.name: 180g Pizzeria Romana
pizzerias.address: Via Tor de' Schiavi, 53, 00172 Roma RM
pizzerias.specialty: Aloha (fresh pineapple, porchetta, fior di latte)
pizzerias.description: Named for the precise weight of their dough balls, this modern pizzeria offers an Italian twist on Hawaiian pizza by replacing ham with porchetta.

pizzerias.name: Piccolo Buco
pizzerias.specialty: Pizza Ananas (fresh pineapple, prosciutto cotto, fior di latte)
pizzerias.description: Despite its tiny size (the name means 'small hole'), this pizzeria near the Trevi Fountain offers Neapolitan-Roman hybrid pizzas with a fluffy cornicione and crispy base.

pizzerias.name: La Gatta Mangiona
pizzerias.specialty: Paradiso Tropicale (fresh pineapple, smoked ham, provola, basil)
pizzerias.description: This 'Eating Cat' pizzeria in Monteverde is known for experimental toppings and offers a gourmet take on pineapple pizza with smoked ham.

pizzerias.name: Alice Pizza
pizzerias.specialty: Taglio Hawaiano (pineapple, ham, mozzarella on rectangular slice)
pizzerias.description: Popular pizza al taglio chain with multiple locations around Rome. Offers affordable, high-quality pizza by the slice, including a Hawaiian option.

pizzerias.name: Ivo a Trastevere
pizzerias.address: Via di San Francesco a Ripa, 158, 00153 Roma RM
pizzerias.specialty: Pizza Hawaii (pineapple, cooked ham, mozzarella on thin Roman crust)
pizzerias.description: Historic Trastevere pizzeria open since 1959 with traditional Roman pizzas. While they pride themselves on classic recipes, they prepare Hawaiian pizza upon request.

disclaimer: Information may have changed since the last update. Pineapple on pizza remains controversial in Italy, so availability may vary. Please check with the establishments directly for the most current menu offerings and details.
